pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃsenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.5: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃsessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.6: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.9: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.10: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:1.1.12: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:2.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:2.1.13: codeti vā codāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc76:2.2.4: Ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā vā anuddhaṃseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
